messages.title: A strong voice for Reading West
messages.content: Meri O'Connell is the right choice for Reading West. With your vote, Meri O'Connell can win!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
Generate 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025. We will plant 60 million trees every year to cover 1 million hectares by 2045.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give Every Child The Best Start In Life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recruit 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.
Provide free childcare from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and training throughout their lives.
Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Jeremy Corbyn will lose the election. Boris Johnson can't be trusted. Lib Dems CAN WIN for YOU. How Reading West voted in the EU Election in May.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
issues.economy: Provide free childcare from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and training throughout their lives.
issues.education: Recruit 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.
issues.environment: Generate 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025. We will plant 60 million trees every year to cover 1 million hectares by 2045.
issues.health: Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

endorsements.endorsement: I'm impressed by Jo Swinson. I think if I was living in a lot of constituencies I would lend my vote to the Liberal Democrats.
I'm not sure yet, but I may protest and vote Lib Dem.
Say no to Johnson and Corbyn and all of their candidates. Start the process of building something new.
Millions of Tories will now vote Lib Dem because of Brexit.

examples: How Reading West voted in the EU Election in May: 22.3% LD, 32.7% BXP, 15.4% GRN, 13.2% LAB, 9.4% CON
